title: Led Zeppelin Celebration Day Blu-Ray 1080p HEVC 10Bit AC3
description:
My Blu-Ray rips are always taken DIRECTLY from the actual blu-rays, not re-encodings of an earlier h264 torrent, and not "filled in" with web downloads. 

HEVC is a superb machine, but it should be given quality raw materials.

----------------

This is Led Zeppelin's performance at the Ahmet Ertegun Tribute Concert on 10th December 2007. 

Jason Bonham joined his later father's bandmates for a blistering and probably final performance.

Named "Celebration Day" when released a few years later across many formats, this is a 10 bit HEVC, taken from the actual blu-ray.

I used x265, "veryslow" preset, to create a 10 bit VBR in 2 passes, at an average of 2000kbps and peak of 3000kbps. It took several
 attempts using less bandwidth, to get the quality I was happy with. The final encoding required 13 days on a spare Athlon PC!

The audio is 5.1 AC3 at 384kbps. Unusually, this blu-ray plays at 29.97fps (NTSC speed). I tried to use inverse telecine to convert 
it to 23.976fps but the results were poor in places, so 29.97fps it is, I'm afraid.

I also included named chapter marks, so that you can locate your prefered songs.

Here are the tracks:-

00:01:40.000 Good Times, Bad Times
00:04:55.000 Ramble On
00:10:30.000 Black Dog
00:15:57.000 In My Time of Dying
00:28:14.000 For Your Life
00:35:14.000 Trampled Under Foot
00:42:18.000 Nobody's Fault But Mine
00:49:16.000 No Quarter
00:58:41.000 Since I've Been Loving You
01:07:05.000 Dazed and Confused
01:18:59.000 Stairway To Heaven
01:27:47.000 The Song Remains The Same
01:34:25.000 Misty Mountain Hop
01:39:33.000 Kashmir
01:49:38.000 Whole Lotta Love
01:58:02.000 Rock and Roll

Enjoy, and please, please, continue to seed after you have download
